title: Pick up a Mystery Skin for a short time!

replies.body: Riot, my wallet has been with me for most of my life. We have made a strong connection and promised that we would never part from each other. However, you seem to be interrupting this joyous relationship of ours. You're taking Wally away from me! Wally NOOO!!!
Wally was my dearest friend. DON'T YOU DARE GIVE HIM AWAY! NOT LIKE THIS!
RIP in peace Wally
Wall-E{{champion:53}}
{{champion:61}} EVE
Wally was a friend...you can make out with a little, and it won't be awkward the next day... I will place him where my butt is...and it would tickle... I'll miss you Wally
Screw Wally, I want me some skins!!
Eve is that you?
No it's patrick
No, its Adam.

I couldn't find my best friend wallet around the whole wide world...

His name is Waldo, have any of you seen him? :(
In England, Where's Waldo is actually Where's Wally. I have never seen him in all my life.

Damn! I got nothing out of that one....maybe...maybe just one more won't hurt, maybe I'll get that seasonal skin I've been wanting...DAMMIT, NOTHING AGAIN....well certainly one more won't break my bank.
my life in a post

I'm considering standing next to an off ramp by I-94 holding a sign that reads:

"Will play {{champion:6}} for RP. Have a great day and Rito bless."
/waves from Wisconsin. Not sure where you are at but I-94 is familiar :p
10/10 would laugh.
Why you do this Rito, I'm already trying to save RP to get those LCS skins :\
LCS Skins, I think you mean Dunkmaster {{champion:122}}

I just used Dunkmaster Darius, just gotta say his ult needs to be a bit more epic. Like you have five basketball stacks around your target, the long awaited hoop appears, and Darius begins to dunk it. It just happens so fast it doesn't feel like a dunk. My opinions from the PBE
They can't really help the speed of the ult, the new animation has to play off in the same amount of time it takes the normal Darius skin, or else the skin makes Darius stronger, or weaker
{{item:3301}} {{item:3093}} I need more money..
{{champion:40}} I'll make it rain
pppppppfffffffffffffffft please{{champion:21}}
{{champion:119}}  You rang?
lets doo this{{champion:41}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3093}}
A skin's a skin.. but a mystery gift could be anything! It could even be a skin!
Mystery Skins never left tho.. have I been purchasing them illegally this whole time?  ggwp
You can buy them for yourself now for a limited time

Lucked out I got: Bucaneer Tristana, SKT T1 Vayne, Blackfrost Anivia, Shadow Evelynn, and Earnest Elf Tristana.

You can't buy Earnest Elf Tristana anymore and Blackfrost Anivia is Legendary.

My dream has come true, I've got every single Blitzcrank skin I've always wanted and now all that remains is Rusty... T~T I've waited years to have every single blitzcrank skin. This is the best moment of my life.{{champion:53}} The time of man has finally come to an end.

In order that I opened them.
1. Badger {{champion:17}} My thoughts:**Screw Riot!**
2. Uncle {{champion:13}}  **Why Rito?**
3. Slay Belle {{champion:55}} **Nice**
4. Dragonslayer {{champion:80}} **Better**
5. Spirit Guard {{champion:77}} **THANK YOU BASED RIOT**
When does the timer reset i got 5 waiting to get 5 more today.... it's been over 20 hours since i bought the first 5...
is kitty kat avalble

Thanks Riot for putting this event at the end of the month. I would'n't have a problem if it carried over around the first week of next month, but really? The END of the month? When most people including me don't have any money to spend? I was saddened when I figured out I missed out on this same event a couple months ago, but now depressed to have it happen again when I can't spend even a dollar.
I thought you said silent night sona though
Got 2 {{champion:37}} skin
Oh my bad thought you was listing watcha got from the mystery thing. They are nice skins though <3 {{champion:37}} ONLY Love Here <3
Riot im only 6 rp away from a mystery skin! It would make m shitty week a great one if yall would be able to do this  {{champion:32}}  {{item:3070}}

Wallets weren't supposed to be used like this!

NOT LIKE THIS!
I got Bewitching Nidalee.  Awesome!!
Well I just used all my rp.

rest in pepperonis, wallet
we had a good run
Just got Final Boss Veigar from mystery skin Thank Riot!
I got Snow Bunny Nidalee =D
